author: kwright
msg: Partial fix for CONNECTORS-110.  Move the logic for DISTINCT ON into the database driver, and reorganize the queries to work with Derby, since its GROUP BY logic is quite different from Postgresql's.  The Derby implementation of DISTINCT ON is not correct, but will at least keep there from being exceptions.

author: nick
msg: Add test that shows that bug #45877 has already been fixed

author: jcosters
msg: - add target collect-result to qa/build.xml, that will zip the QA test result HTML reports. This allows for Hudson to pick it up and archive it as a build artifact for every build attempt, as well as developer/testers to more easily send in their results
- move specification of default value for run.categories to qa/build.xml
- change call to qa.run-categories to qa.run, which also collects the HTML reports
